caption:
In the photograph, a group of people is gathered outside a building, specifically in front of an establishment named "Holiday Inn". A man, dressed in a dark business suit and black shoes, is in the foreground bending over on a concrete path to operate a yellow and black machine labeled "ULTRA CHARGER". This machine appears to be a portable device, perhaps for charging or powering equipment.

There are several other individuals in the scene: one man in a gray suit stands to the right with his arms folded, looking at the central action. Another individual, obscured in the background, gestures with their hand mid-conversation. To the left, a group observes or engages in discussions, including a person holding a camera, possibly capturing the event.

The environment is overcast, with a relatively dim light setting, suggesting either an early morning or a cloudy day. In the background, the two-story "Holiday Inn" building can be seen, with an exterior composed mainly of brick and a prominent sign on the roof displaying its name.
title: Exhibit at the first symposium on low pollution power systems development held at the marriott motor inn, ann arbor vehicles and hardware were assembled at the epa ann arbor laboratory.  Part of the exhibit was held in the motel parking lot the ebs "sundancer", an experimental electric car, gets its batteries charged from an outlet in the parking lot
